name: Ships of Nightmare
description:
It is a side-scrolling beat-em-up game with the objective to defeat the enemies that are on board the ship. It is a 3D game and the player can do light/heavy attacks, and jump and roll movements to help defeat the enemies. This game was made in approximately 6 weeks and has features such as an introduction, an in-game currency and sound effects. Breaking barrels and killing enemies gives corks that the player can use to buy upgrades to help defeat the final boss and complete the game.

Created by Arif, Anthony, Howard, Saul and Damian from MMU.
